title: Garlic Greens
ingredients: 1 bunch of greens (mustard, turnip, or collard)

directions.text: Remove green steams and shred, dice one of the garlic gloves, crush the rest and set aside.
Cover bottom of a deep skillet with olive oil, and get hot under medium heat.
Sautee the crushed garlic for 5 mins then remove garlic.
Add greens then diced garlic and saut√©ed until wilted.
